data.name: Prelate
data.description:
Support unit with no combat capability. Automatically inspires Villagers to greatly improve their gather rate. Can pick up Relics, convert enemy units, and capture Sacred Sites starting in the Castle Age (III).

+ Heals friendly units

- Low health

data.description:
Durable infantry transport effective against buildings and walls.

+ High ranged armor

+ High health

- Slow movement speed

data.name: Bombard
data.description:
Intimidating siege gun excellent against buildings or any stubborn targets.

+ High damage

- Must be set up to fire

data.name: Springald
data.description:
Effective at taking out high value targets at long range. Fires after quickly setting up.

+ Long range

+ Bonus damage vs siege engines

- Trivial damage vs. buildings

data.name: Trader
data.description: Traders generate Gold when assigned to trade with a Trade Post or another player’s Market. Once assigned to trade, the Trader makes repeated trips between its Home Market and the Trade Target. You can assign a new Home Market if you wish to.

data.name: Trebuchet
data.description:
Powerful siege engine effective at destroying buildings and walls over a great distance.

+ Bonus damage vs buildings

- Must be set up to fire

- Inaccurate against units
